Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: SoftSystemsStudio
Message:
feat: add CI boot test to catch missing deps early

- Add boot-test.ts script that validates critical module imports
- Add boot-test and boot-test:dist npm scripts
- Update CI workflows to run boot test after build
- Tests: express, zod, @prisma/client, ioredis, jsonwebtoken, pino
- Also validates internal env and logger modules load correctly

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: SoftSystemsStudio
Message:
feat(phase4): deployment hardening & CI/CD integrity

- Enhanced ci-cd.yml with typecheck, Redis service, staging branch support
- Added concurrency control, build artifacts, GitHub environments
- Created .env.staging.example and .env.production.example templates
- Added deploy:staging, deploy:production scripts to agent-api
- Created scripts/deploy.sh with pre-deploy checks, migration confirmation
- Added /status endpoint with uptime, version, db latency, memory usage
- Added Kubernetes-ready probes: /status/ready, /status/live
- Integrated Sentry v10 for error tracking with captureException
- Added sentryRequestHandler and sentryErrorHandler Express middleware
- Added NODE_ENV guardrails: assertHardDeleteAllowed, assertBulkOperationAllowed
- Added assertSeedAllowed, assertWorkspaceScoped for tenant isolation
- Wrapped async route handlers with asyncHandler to fix ESLint errors
- Added typecheck, test:ci, ci scripts to root package.json
